String.string: Let the Torch of the Gods light your way!
[Vale of Spires] Gather icemarrow and firemarrow to complete the Torch of the Gods.
[Scorched Snowfield] Gather glacial fragments under the bridge into Frostclaw Crag for the Torch of the Gods.
Bring the materials you've gathered to the blacksmith.
[Habere] Speak with the legendary blacksmith, who just completed his work, and get the Torch of the Gods from him.
[Habere] Meet Gaicus and ask about a purification totem.
